attributes.action: President Trump should be made a British Citizen for his services to Democracy
attributes.additional_details: Whilst not been everybodies cup of tea Mr President Donald Trump is British by birth right. He has shown true British Spirit and Citizenship and is a great political leader of the free world. Acknowledging this service with British Citizenship is wholly appropriate
attributes.background: The 45th President Mr Donald Trump is British by descent. He should be given British Citizenship on his arrival in the UK, for his outstanding services to Worldwide Democracy and all that is British
